creator: tuinstra@inteo.com
text:
On this page: 
 
http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.1-doc/class-loader-howto.html 
 
under section "Class Loader Definitions", bullet "Shared", is the statement "... classes and 
resources in JAR files under $CATALINA_HOME/lib, are made visible through this class 
loader." Shouldn't this be "$CATALINA_HOME/shared/lib" ?
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 10627 ***
creator: markt@apache.org
